articles.title: Lynn man charged in kidnapping, murder of older sister
articles.description:
Joshua Smith, 30, pleaded not guilty to murder and kidnapping charges in court Monday, according to reports.

The post Lynn man charged in kidnapping, murder of older sister appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Joshua Smith, 30, charged with kidnapping and murdering his older sister.
Smith pleaded not guilty in court on September 8, 2025.
This case raises concerns about safety and crime in Lynn, impacting local residents.

articles.title: Patriots captain believes defense showed ‘glimpse of dominance’ vs. Raiders
articles.description:
"We all know on the defensive side of the ball, the sky’s the limit for us."

The post Patriots captain believes defense showed ‘glimpse of dominance’ vs. Raiders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots defense showcased strong performance against Raiders on September 8, 2025.
Captain emphasizes potential for dominance, boosting team morale for upcoming games.
Improved defense could enhance fan support and attendance at Gillette Stadium.
